name: BBM Fan Game
description:
THE BEST PRESIDENT EVUR XD XD UwU!!!1!

Defend yourself from the savages claiming what they think is theirs. You earned that fair and square. Finders-Keepers! Breathe Copium, PEASANTS!

PLEASE DONT BLACKLIST ME TO BE TOURTURED BY THE PNP

GLORY TO THE PHILIPPINES! GLORY TO GOD!

Disclaimer: This is satire. AND cringe.
if you got a problem about this, I won't be fixing this.
This is literally a game I whipped up in a day and while learning how Pygame works. 
I won't be updating or doing anything about it.
